info.name: Firefox - Flawed Custom Close Tab Button
info.description: Firefox UI styles are for Firefox 28 and below. It mimics the look of the close tab button. You can customize the color of the "x" and background color. Read the code, it has comments. It's flawed because I can't get the x to be vertically centered, and controlling the height without clipping is problematic, so it looks a little awkward (rectangular). I have no idea how this will perform on non-English localizations of Firefox.
